price: Enyi mlio amini! Mkimnusuru Mwenyezi Mungu naye atakunusuruni na ataithibitisha miguu yenu.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِن تَنصُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَنصُرۡكُمۡ وَيُثَبِّتۡ أَقۡدَامَكُمۡ
footnotes: Enyi mlio amini! Mkiinusuru Dini ya Mwenyezi Mungu, na Yeye atakunusuruni muwashinde maadui zenu, na ayatilie nguvu mambo yenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū in tanṣurū al-laha yanṣur'kum wayuthabbit aqdāmakum
